thread.title: Ranveer Singh Hung Out With Ajay Devgn And Rohit Shetty For A Possible Cameo in Golmaal Again
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh Hung Out With Ajay Devgn And Rohit Shetty For A Possible Cameo in Golmaal Again

title: Ranveer Singh Hung Out With Ajay Devgn And Rohit Shetty For A Possible Cameo in Golmaal Again

persons.name: ranveer singh hung out with ajay devgn

text: facebook Recently, Ranveer Singh hung out on the sets of Golmaal Again with director Rohit Shetty and actor Ajay Devgn. As it is with our imaginative minds, we could only think of a cameo on the cards. A picture of this, alleged, spontaneous meet-up was shared on Twitter by the movie’s official handle. — Golmaal Again (@GolmaalMovie) March 21, 2017 Mumbai Mirror , however, reports otherwise . “Ranveer was shooting a commercial in the same studio and when he learnt that Rohit and Ajay were shooting on the premises, and he strolled across to meet them. The trio spent half-an-hour chatting. Parineeti Chopra who’d worked with Ranveer earlier in Kill Dil , also joined them. They spoke about Golmaal Again and comedies in general, a genre Ranveer likes , ” the paper reported. Honestly, it won’t be a total presumption to anticipate this collaboration, considering that the Padmavati actor has shown interest in another one of Rohit Shetty’s projects , My name is Lakhan . A nd if the reports are to believed, the actor is sold on this Telegu-hit-inspired movie.
